feed.title: Google Cloud: Access Approval
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Access Approval

entry.summary: NCC Gateway is now available in preview. This new feature allows for enhanced connectivity and management.
entry.title: Feature: NCC Gateway Now in Preview

entry.summary: We are pleased to announce that Certificate Manager is now generally available. This feature helps you manage TLS/SSL certificates for your applications.
entry.title: Feature: Certificate Manager Now Generally Available

entry.content: Memorystore for Redis Cluster is generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Memorystore for Redis Cluster has reached general availability. This feature offers a fully managed Redis cluster experience, enhancing performance and scalability for your applications.
entry.title: Feature: Memorystore for Redis Cluster Now Generally Available

entry.summary: Memorystore for Valkey has reached general availability. This means it is production-ready and available for use. availability.
entry.title: Feature: Memorystore for Valkey is now generally available

entry.summary: Cloud TPU has reached general availability.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud TPU now generally available

entry.content: Access Approval supports Chrome Enterprise Premium secure gateway in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval now supports Chrome Enterprise Premium secure gateway in the General Availability stage.
entry.title: Feature: Access Approval now supports Chrome Enterprise Premium secure gateway

entry.summary: Image streaming has reached general availability.
entry.title: Feature: Image streaming is now available

entry.content: Access Approval supports Web Risk in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval now fully supports Web Risk, marking a significant enhancement for security and compliance. This feature is now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Web Risk Support in Access Approval Reaches GA

entry.content: Access Approval supports Firebase Data Connect in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval now supports Firebase Data Connect in the general availability stage. This integration allows for enhanced security and control over data access within Firebase applications.
entry.title: Feature: Access Approval now supports Firebase Data Connect

entry.content: Access Approval supports Security Command Center Premium tier in the GA stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval has reached General Availability for Security Command Center Premium tier users. This integration provides enhanced security and control over data access.
entry.title: Feature: Access Approval Now Generally Available for Security Command Center Premium Users

entry.content: Access Approval supports Firebase Data Connect in the Preview stage.
entry.summary: Access Approval now supports Firebase Data Connect in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Access Approval now supports Firebase Data Connect
